posts.tweetText: Frens….do not let me take all your $SOL pls

Today we unveiled a new protocol launching soon on mainnet called OpenTote. 

This smart contract powers parimutuel betting pools for Photo Finish LIVE and our upcoming Simulcast.

Pretty bummed I am missing the inaugural 
@SolanaConf
 in NYC.  Was planning on making it for 2 days but couldn't make it happen. 

Production quality looks to be on the same level as Breakpoint. Solana ecosystem is thriving.

Check price, Good price.

IBRL

Btw If you couldn't make it either, you can watch it all live on their YouTube channel, or at their Twitter account.

I am gonna wait till its over and pop it all on 2X speed to see what I missed. 

Highly recommend you do the same. A lot of exciting stuff being built on Solana.

Bitcoin ATH is the moment most traders realize they’ve wasted the cycle.

The hardest lesson in crypto is realizing you lost while chasing victory.

Not because they lost everything, but because they spent two years glued to screens, chasing risk, convincing themselves they had
